title: Peptide Infused Nail Recovery System for Damaged or Aging Nails
description: Unlock the true potential to successfully grow your own natural nails longer, stronger, and healthier with the Dermelect Peptide Infused Nail Recovery System for Damaged or Aging Nails. Discover this true, anti-aging nail regimen that is the first to utilize protein-peptide technology to hydrate, protect and strengthen nails. Similar to multi-peptide technology for the treatment of aging skin, the breakthrough keratin ingredient provides a unique delivery system of protein peptides directly to the nail bed to encourage stubborn nails to grow. If the elements, acrylics or aging have taken their toll on your nails you can now restore and recover your nails to their natural strength by utilizing this simple step by step program.  Perfect for nails that are: Hard-to-grow; Acrylic/gel damaged; Thin, weak, brittle, chipping and/or splitting; Discolored, uneven, ridged  Key igredients: Keratin Protein Peptide: Strengthening; Pentavitin: A crucial moisture binding agent, acts like a water magnet for your dry, brittle nails; Hyaluronic acid: A super hydrator that restores the moisture balance; Green tea: Antioxidant; Vitamin E: Restorative; Shea butter: Moisturizing  See clinically proven results in 3 weeks!96% nails appear rejuvenated and their cuticles softened; 93% reported more flexible and hydrated nails; 96% improved overall appearance of nails and cuticles; 89% one of the best nail treatments ever used Benefits:5-FREE: Formaldehyde, toluene, DBP, camphor, formaldehyde resin; Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever; Hydroquinone free; Paraben free The Science Behind The Innovation:  New Zealand wool protein biotechnology is the breakthrough ingredient in a new generation of nail and hand care products launched by Dermelect Cosmeceuticals. Keratin, the main protein in fingernails and skin, diminishes as we age and expose our nails to everyday wear and tear. The peptide ingredient is extracted from wool in a gentle yet powerful process keeping the protein intact maintaining its potency without damaging the amino acids that make it up. The integrity of the extracted peptide (keratin protein) is in a near-perfect state yielding unprecedented age-defying, strengthening and softening properties for the nails and hands.  DBP, formaldehyde & toluene free. Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever! Hydroquinone free. Paraben free. A $62 value! Contains Full Sized Treatments: Rejuvenail Fortifying Nail & Cuticle Treatment (1.0 oz.); Launchpad Nail Strengthener (0.4 fl. oz.); Makeover Ridge Filler (0.4 fl. oz.); High Maintenance Instant Nail Thickener (0.4 fl. oz.)

description: Unlock the true potential to successfully grow your own natural nails longer, stronger, and healthier with the Dermelect Peptide Infused Nail Recovery System for Damaged or Aging Nails. Discover this true, anti-aging nail regimen that is the first to utilize protein-peptide technology to hydrate, protect and strengthen nails. Similar to multi-peptide technology for the treatment of aging skin, the breakthrough keratin ingredient provides a unique delivery system of protein peptides directly to the nail bed to encourage stubborn nails to grow. If the elements, acrylics or aging have taken their toll on your nails you can now restore and recover your nails to their natural strength by utilizing this simple step by step program.  Perfect for nails that are: Hard-to-grow; Acrylic/gel damaged; Thin, weak, brittle, chipping and/or splitting; Discolored, uneven, ridged  Key igredients: Keratin Protein Peptide: Strengthening; Pentavitin: A crucial moisture binding agent, acts like a water magnet for your dry, brittle nails; Hyaluronic acid: A super hydrator that restores the moisture balance; Green tea: Antioxidant; Vitamin E: Restorative; Shea butter: Moisturizing  See clinically proven results in 3 weeks!96% nails appear rejuvenated and their cuticles softened; 93% reported more flexible and hydrated nails; 96% improved overall appearance of nails and cuticles; 89% one of the best nail treatments ever used Benefits:5-FREE: Formaldehyde, toluene, DBP, camphor, formaldehyde resin; Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever; Hydroquinone free; Paraben free The Science Behind The Innovation:  New Zealand wool protein biotechnology is the breakthrough ingredient in a new generation of nail and hand care products launched by Dermelect Cosmeceuticals. Keratin, the main protein in fingernails and skin, diminishes as we age and expose our nails to everyday wear and tear. The peptide ingredient is extracted from wool in a gentle yet powerful process keeping the protein intact maintaining its potency without damaging the amino acids that make it up. The integrity of the extracted peptide (keratin protein) is in a near-perfect state yielding unprecedented age-defying, strengthening and softening properties for the nails and hands.  DBP, formaldehyde & toluene free. Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever! Hydroquinone free. Paraben free. A $62 value! description: Unlock the true potential to successfully grow your own natural nails longer, stronger, and healthier with the Dermelect Peptide Infused Nail Recovery System for Damaged or Aging Nails. Discover this true, anti-aging nail regimen that is the first to utilize protein-peptide technology to hydrate, protect and strengthen nails. Similar to multi-peptide technology for the treatment of aging skin, the breakthrough keratin ingredient provides a unique delivery system of protein peptides directly to the nail bed to encourage stubborn nails to grow. If the elements, acrylics or aging have taken their toll on your nails you can now restore and recover your nails to their natural strength by utilizing this simple step by step program.  Perfect for nails that are: Hard-to-grow; Acrylic/gel damaged; Thin, weak, brittle, chipping and/or splitting; Discolored, uneven, ridged  Key igredients: Keratin Protein Peptide: Strengthening; Pentavitin: A crucial moisture binding agent, acts like a water magnet for your dry, brittle nails; Hyaluronic acid: A super hydrator that restores the moisture balance; Green tea: Antioxidant; Vitamin E: Restorative; Shea butter: Moisturizing  See clinically proven results in 3 weeks!96% nails appear rejuvenated and their cuticles softened; 93% reported more flexible and hydrated nails; 96% improved overall appearance of nails and cuticles; 89% one of the best nail treatments ever used Benefits:5-FREE: Formaldehyde, toluene, DBP, camphor, formaldehyde resin; Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever; Hydroquinone free; Paraben free The Science Behind The Innovation:  New Zealand wool protein biotechnology is the breakthrough ingredient in a new generation of nail and hand care products launched by Dermelect Cosmeceuticals. Keratin, the main protein in fingernails and skin, diminishes as we age and expose our nails to everyday wear and tear. The peptide ingredient is extracted from wool in a gentle yet powerful process keeping the protein intact maintaining its potency without damaging the amino acids that make it up. The integrity of the extracted peptide (keratin protein) is in a near-perfect state yielding unprecedented age-defying, strengthening and softening properties for the nails and hands.  DBP, formaldehyde & toluene free. Cruelty free. No animal testing, ever! Hydroquinone free. Paraben free. A $62 value! Contains Full Sized Treatments: Rejuvenail Fortifying Nail & Cuticle Treatment (1.0 oz.); Launchpad Nail Strengthener (0.4 fl. oz.); Makeover Ridge Filler (0.4 fl. oz.); High Maintenance Instant Nail Thickener (0.4 fl. oz.)

description: Nicole by OPI Top Coat creates a matte effect and prevents your nail polish from chipping. Give nails a matte effect by transforming lacquer to have a flat finish.

title: Matte Top Coat
description: Make any lacquer a matte finish with Matte Top Coat by Orly.

description: Formulated with active plasticizer technology, the Ever Glaze Active Topcoat fuses to lock in color and shine just like gel polish. No base coat or UV light needed. description: Essie's No Chips Ahead Top Coat is formulated with a UV color shield and a wear extender to help avoid chipping and peeling. For nails that are hard to grow, use with Grow Faster Base Coat for best results.Whether your nails are normal, weak, slow to grow, or aging, this Essie Nail Care collection is the complete approach to perfect nails.

description: We admit it. We're all in a hurry. That's why Morgan Taylor's faster-than-fast-dry top coat breaks through the finish line first with winning wear and shine. Best yet, it's a picture-perfect finish for all nail types.

description: Morgan Taylor React makes every lacquer you own better! Breakthrough shine and wear without investing in an entirely new color line! React Base Coat provides radical color adhesion, while React Top Coat seals the deal with chip resistance that outshines the rest!Benefits:Applies like regular base and top coat; Dry to the touch in 8 minutes; Soak-free removal

title: Matte Magic
description: China Glaze Matte Magic Top Coat contains China clay as a hardener. Free of DBP, toluene and added formaldehyde. China Glaze's use of extra pigments and dyes results in even durable coverage.

description: Gives nails a super slick shine with lasting protection.

description: Sally Hansen's Gel Shine 3D Top Coat goes on thick, dries quick. Unique Vinyl & Gel Tech formula combines with nail color to create multi-dimensional shine & volume. Transform your regular shine into spectacularly gel-like brilliance with no UV light!

description: Make your manicure resistant to peeling and chipping with this acrylic top coat. Applied directly after dry, freshly applied nail color or as a freshening coat between manicures, this product adds strength and beauty to polished nails.
